TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelReceiver implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel

summary.span: Предоставляет необходимые функции и свойства для каналов получателя.

span.span: Provides required functions and properties for the receiver channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks На принимающей стороне каналы должны предоставлять интерфейса.The receiving side of channels must expose the interface. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData/CPP/ichannelreceiver_channeldata_server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData/CS/ichannelreceiver_channeldata_server.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData/VB/ichannelreceiver_channeldata_server.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartListening(object data) cil managed

summary.span: Дает текущему каналу команду на отслеживание запросов.

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Объект данных может использоваться для передачи конкретного состояния инициализации в канал.The data object can be used to pass specific initialization state to the channel. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData/CPP/ichannelreceiver_channeldata_server.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData/CS/ichannelreceiver_channeldata_server.cs#4)] [!code-vb[IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData/VB/ichannelreceiver_channeldata_server.vb#4)]

span.span: Optional state information for the channel.

summary.span: Дает текущему каналу команду на прекращение отслеживания запросов.

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.
